Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStatusObserver
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameStatusObserver

  • Field Details

    • players

      private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​GameController> players
      The players connected to the server. The map associate each username to the relative GameController. If a user has not joined yet a match, his GameController is null

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      private Server()
      Empty constructor that initializes an empty list of players

  • Method Details

    • loadServer

      public static Server loadServer()
      Creates a new Server Object and loads the games suspended and stored
      Returns:
      an instance of the server

    • getGameController

      private GameController getGameController​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns the GameController associated to the specified user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the GameController associated to the user

    • getAvailableMatches

      private java.util.List<GameController> getAvailableMatches()
      List the matches that the user can join
      Returns:
      a list of game controllers relating to matches that the user can join

    • updateMatchesList

      private void updateMatchesList()
      updates the matches list both locally and on disk

    • onStatusChanged

      public void onStatusChanged​(GameController gameController)
      Updates GameController's match's save or deletes it in case it ended
      Specified by:
      onStatusChanged in interface GameStatusObserver
      Parameters:
      gameController - the match that needs to be updated or deleted

    • addPlayerToMatch

      private void addPlayerToMatch​(java.lang.String username, GameController gameController, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Add a new player to the specified match
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be added
      gameController - the game controller of the match chosen
      clientHandler - the clientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the chosen match is full

    • handleReceivedMessage

      protected void handleReceivedMessage​(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Method that map a message and a ClientHandler with the the action that must be executed
      Parameters:
      message - the message received from the client
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • login

      private void login​(java.lang.String newUsername, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Accept a new user to the server. If the username is already taken by another user, the login will fail. If the user was already known, he will be reconnected.
      Parameters:
      newUsername - the username of the new user
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • isAvailableUsername

      private boolean isAvailableUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns true if the given username is available, false if the chosen username has already been taken by another user
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the given username is available, false if the chosen username has already been taken by another user

    • listLobbies

      private void listLobbies​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Send a list of lobbies that a new user can join to the ClientHandler through a new virtualView specially created
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • createNewLobby

      private void createNewLobby​(int playersNumber, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Associate the user to the chosen lobby. It also connects the user to the realative game controller or crete a new one. The name of the new match is the username of the current user
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players that can join the match
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • joinLobby

      private void joinLobby​(java.lang.String matchName, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Makes the player join the lobby if possible
      Parameters:
      matchName - the match the player wants to join in
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler of the player who wants to join in the match

    • isDisconnected

      private boolean isDisconnected​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns true if the user has been disconnected, false if the user is online
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has been disconnected, false if the user is online

    • connect

      private void connect​(java.lang.String username, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Marks the username as chosen and sends the list of available lobbies to the ClientHandler. The username is added to the players list with a null GameController
      Parameters:
      username - the username to add
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • reconnect

      private void reconnect​(java.lang.String username, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Marks as active an user that was disconnected. Associates a new virtual view to his PlayerController and send him the current state of the match to resume it.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the reconnected user
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler that manages the socket connection with the client

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect​(java.lang.String username)
      Mark the user as inactive
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the disconnected user

    • log

      public static void log​(java.lang.String msg)
      Logs messages
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to log
